name: Student Digital Planners For IPad/GoodNotes,Academic Digital Planner,College Student Digital Planner
description_html:
Introducing the Student Digital Planner, a comprehensive and intuitive tool designed to help students stay organized and on top of their responsibilities. The planner offers a range of features to support academic success, including a dashboard to keep track of class schedules, notes, study plans, and reading materials.

The Study Plan feature allows users to create customized study plans that align with their schedule and needs. The Reading Materials and Notes sections provide a central location for keeping track of important study materials, while the Activities Planner helps users stay on top of extracurricular activities and events.

The planner also includes a section for Personal Goals, where users can set and track goals related to their studies, fitness, or personal growth. The To-Do List feature ensures that users stay on top of their tasks and responsibilities, while the Monthly Calendar keeps important dates and deadlines in view.

The Monthly Finances template supports budget management, helping users stay on top of their income and expenses. The Workout Template allows users to track fitness goals and progress.

All pages are linked for easy navigation, ensuring streamlined organization and efficient use of the planner. The user-friendly interface makes it easy to access the information you need, when you need it.

The Student Digital Planner is a powerful tool that helps students stay organized, focused, and on track. Its comprehensive features and intuitive design make it an essential tool for achieving academic success.

name: Undated Digital Planner for GoodNotes & Notability + 28.000 Digital Stickers in PNG files
description_html:
Have you been struggling to stay organized and on top of your schedule?

Or, have you spent hours upon hours searching for the perfect digital planner to streamline your planning process?

These are all very real things people like you go through when striving for maximum productivity!

With this Undated Digital Planner, we'll walk you through breaking that overwhelming idea of disorganization into smaller, more manageable steps so that you can master your schedule effortlessly!


LIST OF PAGES

- Cover Page

- Index Page

- Calendar

- Yearly outlook

- Year at a glance

- Yearly goals

- Monthly layouts (plan, review, goals, budget)

- 10 Note paper templates

EXTRAS

- 28.000 Digital Stickers in PNG files, each available in 14 colors.

- Each theme has 40 covers to choose from.


DETAILS

You'll receive 4 PDF files + a ZIP file with the stickers (1GB+)

4 Themes available:

- Rainbow

- Black

- Pink

- Boho

Instant download after purchase!


PLEASE NOTE:

You will receive an INSTANT DOWNLOAD of this PDF planner, no physical copy will be shipped.

Remember to select the ‚ù§ FAVORITE button on the right to save this product!


HOW TO ORDER

  1. Click the "Add to Cart" button to add this listing to your Gumroad cart.
  2. Complete the checkout process by submitting your payment information and clicking "I want this!"
  3. Once your order is complete, you will receive an email from Gumroad with a link to download the files. You can also find the download link in your Gumroad library (https://gumroad.com/library).
  4. Download the files to your device.
  5. After downloading, import the files into your preferred app such as GoodNotes, Notability, or any annotation apps that support the file format.
  6. Enjoy!

name: Daily/Weekly/Monthly Planner Sheets with Apple Calendar Integration
description_html:
Introducing the next generation of digital planning

Create events, reminders and open other apps all directly from your PDF planner sheet.

Take the effectiveness of digital planning to the next level by syncing your planner with Apple Calendar and Reminders to receive those vital notifications to help you stay on track.

*UPDATE* 2023 Planner with Calendar Integration out now! (get yours here)

Hyperlinked/Integrated Apps:

  • Apple Reminders
  • Apple Calendar
  • Apple Weather
  • Apple Books
  • Apple Notes
  • Apple Clock
  • Apple Mail

FAQ

What devices are compatible?

Compatible with Apple devices. Tested on iPadOS 15/16, MacOS 12/13 and iOS 16. Tested on GoodNotes, Notability, Noteshelf, OneNote, Noteful, CollaNote and QuickNotes X.

How does it work?

The PDF contains hyperlinks that run a Siri Shortcuts action. This allows you to create an event and add a reminder. Other hyperlinks are linked directly to the app.

Questions or issues? Contact us at discovernotesco@gmail.com and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

Personal use only. Please note that depending on the app used there may be additional steps. Siri Shortcuts app required.

*UPDATES*

  • Notability compatability fixed (07/11/22 02:00 GMT)
  • Multiple language support (17/11/22 21:00 GMT)
  • Monthly Planner Sheet (17/11/22 21:00 GMT)
  • Revamped design with new timer functionality (12/02/23 23:00 GMT)
  • Sunday start in landscape and portrait (28/03/23 23:00 BST)
